UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Centrocins: isolation and characterization of novel dimeric antimicrobial peptides from the green sea urchin, Strongylocentrotus droebachiensis.
Literature.Author: Li C, Haug T, Moe MK, Styrvold OB, Stensvag K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=>100µM),Botrytis cinerea 101(MIC=>100µM)
